abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33774577, pmid33709138, pmid32412013, pmid33782995, pmid33780970, pmid33780470, pmid33763939, pmid33818797, pmid33818861, pmid32273141
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2021.04.07
